item.title: The Formula
item.description: A terse and hasty overview for the impatient Successful parents… Have a vision. They are intentional and strategic. Not passive. Make time to learn – often by reading lots of books. Adapt to the child. They study the child closely and tailor their approach. Define a few strict rules but let the child make the remaining decisions. Perform 8 key roles for their kids. The early learning partner The flight engineer The fixer The revealer The philosopher The model The negotiator The GPS The story behind the book “The Formula” is a collaboration between a reporter from the Boston Globe and a Harvard professor.
